title: starting an online boutique as a teen + fashion & beauty tips
itunes:title: starting an online boutique as a teen + fashion & beauty tips
description:
Brooke and Danielle are joined by Aly Silverio to discuss her experiences running online boutiques, her style and her life until this point!  The gals also share what they have been up to including gearing up for the holiday season + more!

Check out the business of the week, Nippy Nature! https://www.nippynature.com/  

Check out Aly Silverio’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alysilverio/  

Check out Aly’s boutique, State of Myne https://www.stateofmyne.com/  

Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/  

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio  

Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/  

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan  

Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/
